msg: Believe in the Magic of the season.
Faith, Love, Hope. Embrace all three this Advent!
Ponder on the true meaning of Christmas.
Help family and friends; be the positive light.
Contemplative time, preparation for the arrival of Christmas.
May our hearts be filled with hope, peace, love, and joy.
Advent invites us to slow down and savor the present moment.
Cherish the simplicity of candlelight, the aroma of fresh pine, and the melody of carols.
Reconcile with those we have wronged, and to cultivate humility and gratitude.
Seek and follow the light, to draw closer to the source of hope.
